fields.name: AdvertiseToFabric
fields.description: The indicator of if this advertisement is also made to the network fabric associated with the Network Cloud Cluster. This field is ignored if fabricPeeringEnabled is set to False.

fields.name: Communities
fields.description: The names of the BGP communities to be associated with the announcement, utilizing a BGP community string in 1234:1234 format.

fields.name: IPAddressPools
fields.description: The names of the IP address pools associated with this announcement.

fields.name: Peers
fields.description: The names of the BGP peers to limit this advertisement to. If no values are specified, all BGP peers will receive this advertisement.
